title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Temporary
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Temporary 

Measures) (No.2) Regulations 2021. 

(2) In these Regulations “EU Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2020/687 

of 17 December 2019. 

(3) A word or expression that is used in the EU Regulation and that is also 
used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention 
appears, the same meaning as in the EU Regulation. 

Application
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited avian influenza (temporary measures) (no.2) regulation 2021 (2) regulation eu regulation mean regulation (eu) 2020 687 17 december 2019 (3) word expression used eu regulation also used regulation regulation unless contrary intention appears meaning eu regulation application

title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: 2. (1) These Regulations, other than Regulations 4 (2) and (3) and 8, apply
text_raw:
2. (1) These Regulations, other than Regulations 4 (2) and (3) and 8, apply 
in that part of the State more particularly described in Part 1 of the Schedule. 
(“surveillance zone”) and Part 2 of the Schedule (“protection zone”). 

(2) Land or premises– 

(a) 

(b) 

that lies partly within the protection zone and partly within the 
surveillance is deemed to lie wholly within the protection zone, 
and 

that, subject to paragraph (a), lies partly within the surveillance 
zone and partly outside the surveillance zone is deemed to lie 
wholly within the surveillance zone. 

Restriction on movement of poultry, etc.
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation regulation 4 (2) (3) 8 apply part state particularly described part 1 schedule ( surveillance zone ) part 2 schedule ( protection zone ) (2) land premises- (a) (b) lie partly within protection zone partly within surveillance deemed lie wholly within protection zone subject paragraph (a) lie partly within surveillance zone partly outside surveillance zone deemed lie wholly within surveillance zone restriction movement poultry etc

title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: 3. (1) A person shall not move, or cause or permit another person to move,
text_raw:
3. (1) A person shall not move, or cause or permit another person to move, 
poultry, other captive birds, eggs, carcasses, poultry litter, poultry manure or 
poultry slurry from the land or premises where they are situated except in 
accordance with a licence granted by an authorised officer. 

(2) A person shall not have poultry, other captive birds, eggs, carcasses, 
poultry litter, poultry manure or poultry slurry that has been moved in 
contravention of paragraph (1) in his or her possession or under his or her 
control. 

1 O.J, L 174 of 3.6.2020, 64; http://data.europa.eu/eli/reg_del/2020/687/oj 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [618] 3 

(3) A person shall not spread, or cause or permit another person to spread, 
poultry litter, poultry manure or poultry slurry on land except in accordance with 
a licence granted by an authorised officer. 

Notification

title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: 4. A person who has poultry or other captive birds in his or her possession
text_raw:
4. A person who has poultry or other captive birds in his or her possession 
or under his or her control or otherwise has knowledge of such poultry or other 
captive birds shall immediately notify an authorised officer at the Regional 
Veterinary Office of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine within 
whose functional area the poultry or other captive birds situate of any increased 
levels of avian influenza, deaths of poultry or other captive birds, or significant 
production drop among poultry or captive birds. 

Restriction on movement of farm animal
text_norm: 4 person poultry captive bird possession control otherwise knowledge poultry captive bird shall immediately notify authorised officer regional veterinary office department agriculture food marine within whose functional area poultry captive bird situate increased level avian influenza death poultry captive bird significant production drop among poultry captive bird restriction movement farm animal

title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: 5. (1) A person shall not move, or cause or permit another person to move,
text_raw:
5. (1) A person shall not move, or cause or permit another person to move, 
a farm animal, other than poultry or other captive birds, from land or premises 
where poultry or other captive birds are present or cause or permit such an animal 
to be on other land or premises except in accordance with a licence granted by 
an authorised officer. 

(2) A person shall not cause or permit – 

(a) poultry or other captive birds, to be brought onto land or premises 
where poultry or other captive birds are present except in 
accordance with a licence granted by an authorised officer, 

(b) 

such poultry or other captive birds that has been brought onto land 
or premises other than in accordance with paragraph (a) to be on 
the land or premises. 

Release of birds
text_norm: 5 (1) person shall move cause permit another person move farm animal poultry captive bird land premise poultry captive bird present cause permit animal land premise except accordance licence granted authorised officer (2) person shall cause permit - (a) poultry captive bird brought onto land premise poultry captive bird present except accordance licence granted authorised officer (b) poultry captive bird brought onto land premise accordance paragraph (a) land premise release bird

title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: 6. A person shall not release poultry or other captive birds from the land or
text_raw:
6. A person shall not release poultry or other captive birds from the land or 
premises where they are kept or cause or permit such birds to be released or stray 
from that land or premises. 

Movement of poultry meat
text_norm: 6 person shall release poultry captive bird land premise kept cause permit bird released stray land premise movement poultry meat

title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: 7. A person shall not move poultry meat from land or premises used by a
text_raw:
7. A person shall not move poultry meat from land or premises used by a 
food business operator (within the meaning of the European Communities (Food 
and Feed Hygiene) Regulations 2020) as a slaughterhouse, cutting plant or cold 
store unless the poultry meat – 

(a) 

(b) 

comes from land or premises that is situate outside the 
surveillance zone or the protection zone, 

Is stored and or transported separately from poultry meat that 
comes from premises situated within the surveillance zone or the 
protection zone, and 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [618] 

(c) 

is transported directly to a place situate outside the surveillance 
zone and the protection zone. 

Licences

title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: 8. (1) An application for a licence under these Regulations shall be in a form,
text_raw:
8. (1) An application for a licence under these Regulations shall be in a form, 
contain such particulars and be made in a manner that an authorized officer may 
determine. 

(2) An authorized officer may grant a licence, attach conditions to a licence, 
vary a condition, insert a new condition, withdraw a licence, or refuse an 
application. 

Restriction on vehicles
text_norm: 8 (1) application licence regulation shall form contain particular made manner authorized officer may determine (2) authorized officer may grant licence attach condition licence vary condition insert new condition withdraw licence refuse application restriction vehicle

title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: 9. (1) A person shall not bring a vehicle onto land or premises where poultry
text_raw:
9. (1) A person shall not bring a vehicle onto land or premises where poultry 
or other captive birds are present unless the vehicle has been cleaned and 
disinfected in a manner that kills the avian influenza virus – 

(a) prior to coming onto the land or premises, and 

(b) 

after it has been on other land or premises where poultry or other 
captive birds are present or being in contact with poultry, other 
captive birds, eggs, carcasses, poultry litter or poultry manure. 

(2) A person shall not have a vehicle that has been brought onto land or 
premises in contravention of paragraph (1) in his or her possession or under his 
or her control. 

Disinfection of vehicles, machinery and equipment
text_norm: 9 (1) person shall bring vehicle onto land premise poultry captive bird present unless vehicle cleaned disinfected manner kill avian influenza virus - (a) prior coming onto land premise (b) land premise poultry captive bird present contact poultry captive bird egg carcass poultry litter poultry manure (2) person shall vehicle brought onto land premise contravention paragraph (1) possession control disinfection vehicle machinery equipment

title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: (1) A person who has charge of a vehicle, machinery or equipment
text_raw:
10. 

(1) A person who has charge of a vehicle, machinery or equipment 
used in connection with poultry or other captive birds or that has been in contact 
with poultry or other captive birds shall take all necessary steps to ensure that 
the vehicle, machinery or equipment is cleaned and disinfected before and 
immediately after use or contact with poultry, other captive birds or any other 
thing that could be affected by avian influenza virus with in a manner that kills 
the virus, in accordance with the instructions (if any) of an authorised officer. 

(2) A person who has poultry or other captive birds in his or her possession 
or under his or her control on land or premises situated in the protection zone 
shall take all necessary steps to ensure that all parts of a vehicle that enters or 
leaves the land or premises is cleaned and disinfected in a manner that kills the 
avian influenza virus, in accordance with the instructions (if any) of an 
authorised officer. 

Disposal of carcasses
text_norm: 10 (1) person charge vehicle machinery equipment used connection poultry captive bird contact poultry captive bird shall take necessary step ensure vehicle machinery equipment cleaned disinfected immediately use contact poultry captive bird thing could affected avian influenza virus manner kill virus accordance instruction (if any) authorised officer (2) person poultry captive bird possession control land premise situated protection zone shall take necessary step ensure part vehicle enters leaf land premise cleaned disinfected manner kill avian influenza virus accordance instruction (if any) authorised officer disposal carcass

title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: 11. A person who has poultry or other captive birds in his or her possession
text_raw:
11. A person who has poultry or other captive birds in his or her possession 
or under his or her control shall take all necessary measures to ensure that 
carcasses are disposed of as soon as possible in accordance with Regulation (EC) 

 
 
 
 
 
 [618] 5 

No 1069/2009 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 21 October
text_norm: 11 person poultry captive bird possession control shall take necessary measure ensure carcass disposed soon possible accordance regulation (ec) 618 5 1069 2009 european parliament council 21 october

title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: Records

title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: 12. (1) A person in possession or control of land or premises situate in the
text_raw:
12. (1) A person in possession or control of land or premises situate in the 
protection zone where poultry or other captive birds are present shall maintain a 
record all persons who enter the land or premises and make the record available 
upon request to an authorised officer. 

(2) Paragraph (1) does not require that a record be maintained of persons 
normally resident there who enter a dwelling on land or premises without having 
contact with poultry or other captive birds, or of persons who enter a zoo or 
wildlife park. 

Penal Provisions
text_norm: 12 (1) person possession control land premise situate protection zone poultry captive bird present shall maintain record person enter land premise make record available upon request authorised officer (2) paragraph (1) require record maintained person normally resident enter dwelling land premise without contact poultry captive bird person enter zoo wildlife park penal provision

heading: 13. Regulations 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 11, 12 and 13 are penal provisions to which
text_raw:
13. Regulations 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 11, 12 and 13 are penal provisions to which 

section 36 (4) (b) of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 applies. 

Revocation

title: used in these Regulations has, in these Regulations unless the contrary intention
heading: 14. The Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) Regulations 2021 are
text_raw:
14. The Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) Regulations 2021 are 

revoked. 

Schedule3 

Part 1 

Regulation 2 

That part of the Counties of Cavan and Monaghan (other than that part described 
in Part 2) that lies within the outer margin of an imaginary line drawn from the 
junction of the roads known as the R188-8 and L2033-0 at Cootehill, continuing 
along the road known as the L2033-0, L2029-0, the L2030-0, the L6138-0, the 
R191-3, the R191-2, the R165-5, the R165-4, the R165-3, the L7556-0, the 
L7557-0, the L08920-0, the L04902-0, the L04901-0, the L04900-0, the R1792, the R179-3 and R-179-4, the R179-5 in a northerly direction from 
Carrickmacross, the N2 Motorway until the exit for Castleblaney and continuing 
through Castleblaney on the Old Dublin Road, the R183, the L03419-0, the L03411-0, the L03420-0, L03421-0, the R184-2, the L07311-0, the L07310-0, the 
L06501-0, the L06511-0, L06510-0, the L06600-0, the R-188-7 and continuing 
on the R188-8 to the junction of that road with the L2033-0 at Cootehill. 

2 O.J. L 200 of 14,11.2009, 1; http://data.europa.eu/eli/reg/2009/1069/oj. 
3 For illustrative purposes only, a map indicating both zones is available on the website of the 
Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [618] 

Part 2 

Protection Zone 

Regulation 2 

That part of the County of Monaghan that lies within the outer margin of an 
imaginary line drawn from the junction of the roads known as the R162-10 and 
the L0310-12 in the townland of Creeve, continuing along the L310-12, the 
L30121, the L03012, and the L07040-0 to the boundary with county Cavan at 
Vicar Bridge and, from there continuing along the county boundary with County 
Cavan, in an easterly direction, to the junction of the R181 and the L04023-0 at 
Loughaphortan, and then continuing along the L04023-0, the L04013-0, the 
L04012, the L04011, the L04010, the R180-3, the L0410, the L03131-0 to the 
junction of that L0310-12 and the R162-10 in the townland of Creeve. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 

24 November, 2021. 

JUNE FANNING, 

An officer authorised to authenticate the Seal of the 
Minister.
